duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop inspiring platform/product visions, derived from business needs, market opportunities, and technology trends.
Decompose business requirements and customer experiences into features and functions that drive the platform/product roadmap.
Work with Technical Program Managers, Developers, UX designers, and internal customers to define the details behind the business requirements.
Act as the voice of the business customer and accountable for the platform services.
Own the working backwards document and vision for feature releases.
Identify gaps and chart new platform capabilities as required.
Participate with the business in customer research to inform platform product feature needs.
Stay aligned with GTM plans for the feature set.
Identify issues that will keep the platform features from delivering on time and/or with the desired requirements and communicate to leadership.
Develop and implement new metrics into measurement techniques; works with development teams to develop reports to monitor them.
Coordinate internal forums to collect and identify feature-level development opportunities.
Own and manage product documentation; enable self-service support and/or work to reduce overhead.
Identify feature risks from business and customer feedback and in-depth analysis of operational performance, share with senior leadership.
Assist with candidate selection and onboarding.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a relevant field (Master's preferred)
